title: Paris Adventure
description: Explore the best of Paris in 4 days, including iconic landmarks, museums, and charming neighborhoods.

stops.title: Eiffel Tower
stops.description: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower and enjoy panoramic views of Paris.
stops.notes: Consider visiting early in the morning to avoid long queues.

stops.title: Champs-Élysées
stops.description: Stroll down the famous avenue and enjoy shopping and cafes.
stops.notes: Great place for a leisurely walk and some shopping.

stops.title: Louvre Museum
stops.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa.
stops.notes: Plan at least half a day to explore the museum's vast collections.

stops.title: Seine River Cruise
stops.description: Enjoy a relaxing cruise along the Seine River, with views of Paris's landmarks.
stops.notes: Evening cruises offer beautiful views of the city illuminated.

stops.title: Montmartre & Sacré-Cœur
stops.description: Explore the artistic neighborhood of Montmartre and visit the Sacré-Cœur Basilica.
stops.notes: Walk up the steps for a great view of Paris.

stops.title: Moulin Rouge
stops.description: Experience the vibrant cabaret show at the world-famous Moulin Rouge.
stops.notes: Book tickets in advance for the best seating.

stops.title: Notre-Dame Cathedral
stops.description: Visit the Gothic masterpiece and climb the towers for a stunning view.
stops.notes: Check restoration status as the cathedral is undergoing repairs.

stops.title: Luxembourg Gardens
stops.description: Relax in the beautiful Luxembourg Gardens, a perfect spot for a picnic.
stops.notes: Ideal for a leisurely afternoon in a peaceful setting.
